title: get rid of stacking champions or change them

replies.body:
I kind of see where you are coming from (though I quite enjoy Veigar). Back when junglers had uncapped on-hit damage it made life terrible for both sides. I banned Nasus all the way through my ranked season this time around too.

That being said, all the current uncapped champs are full of either counterplay (Sion/Thresh) or counterbuilding (nasus/veigar).

Also, the new runes provide the opportunity for uncapped AD, AP, and even HP to any champion. So anyone can be a timebomb if they want to be. If every chooses those runes then something is probably wrong, but I expect that at higher MMR the early-game focused or neutral runes will be more common.
{{sticker:fiora-cool}}
